price: ߊ߬ ߣߴߌ ߦߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߛߐ߲߬ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߸ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߕߊ߲߬ߞߊ ߕߙߊ߫ ߟߴߌ ߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߜߍ߬ߘߍ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߡߙߌߘߐߗߍ ߡߊ߬
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
